title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.1 - Policy

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of this Part, the chief
administrative officer of each local correctional facility shall provide for
and maintain reasonable standards of prisoner personal
hygiene. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7005.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
